NZ Residency status

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ ContactRelationship Value Set

description.value:
NZ ContactRelationship Codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region
This codeset is to be used alongside the HL7 defined general relationship codeset http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0131

name.value: NZ Central Region - Ethnicity Level 2 Value Set

description.value: Ethnicity Level 2 codes from [Ministry of Health](https://www.health.govt.nz/nz-health-statistics/data-references/code-tables/common-code-tables/ethnicity-code-tables)

name.value: NZ Central Region - Marital Status Value Set

description.value: Combined Marital Status value set with values that are in use in Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ Religion Value Set

description.value: NZ Religion Codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ Residency Value Set

description.value: NZ Residency Codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region
Is the person a NZ resident

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ ContactRelationship Code System

description.value:
More granular ContactRelationship codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region.
This codeset is to be used alongside the HL7 defined general relationship codeset in http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/valueset-patient-contactrelationship.html

name.value: NZ Central Region - Ethnicity Level 2 Code System

description.value: Ethnicity Level 2 codes from [Ministry of Health](https://www.health.govt.nz/nz-health-statistics/data-references/code-tables/common-code-tables/ethnicity-code-tables)

name.value: NZ Central Region - Marital Status Code System

description.value: A few extra Marital Status codes that are in use in Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ Religion Code System

description.value: Religion codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

name.value: NZ Central Region - NZ Residency Code System

description.value: Residency codes ex. WebPAS in NZ Central Region

An example of a patient from Te Whatu Ora, Central Region, including the source HL7 v2 message, which when `base64decoded` looks like this:
MSH|^~\&|PROD_WebPAS^RPAS|MCDHB^G00033|Regional HUB^RHUB|RHIP^G09999|20220316091410000+1300||ADT^A31|341P0000000000462041|P|2.4 EVN||20220316091358 PID|||ZHY4846^^^&2.16.840.1.113883.2.18.2||Pond^James^^^FR||19720223000000|M||21^NZ Maori^NZHIS|100 Broadway Avenue^^Palmerston North^^4410^NEW ZEALAND^C~^^^^^NEW ZEALAND^M|1845|^PRN^PH~02758880032^ORN^CP|^WPN^PH|ENG^English^NHDD-132^U|V^Civil Union^HL70002||||||21^NZ Maori^NZHIS~11^NZ European / Pakeha^NZHIS~32^Cook Island Maori^NZHIS||||Y||NZ^New Zealand citizen^RHIP_Resident_Status||N PD1|||Feilding Health Care^^12482^^^&2.16.840.1.113883.2.18.66.3.3.0|66665^Rerekura^Amber-Lea Aroha^^^Dr^^^&2.16.840.1.113883.2.18.66.3.2.0 NK1|1|Lake^Elaine^^^Mrs|03^Sister^webPAS||^PRN^PH~027 8887743^ORN^CP|^WPN^PH NK1|2|Pond^Gwenyth^^^Mrs|01^Mother^webPAS||^PRN^PH~027 5 666 325^ORN^CP|^WPN^PH NK1|3|Moneypenny^Louise^^^Miss|18^De Facto^webPAS||^PRN^PH~021 555 888 6^ORN^CP|^WPN^PH

An example of a patient from Te Whatu Ora, Central Region, with General Practitioner element

An example of a patient from Te Whatu Ora, Central Region, with religious affiliation 'Objects to question' Which means there is no equivalent coding from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ReligiousAffiliation

An example of a patient from Te Whatu Ora, Central Region, with religious affiliation requiring two codings: * The raw coding from WebPAS with coding from https://standards.digital.health.nz/ns/central-region/patient-religion * Equivalent coding from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ReligiousAffiliation
